channel.title: Pickup Restrictions
channel.description:
Is there a way to add restrictions to the pickup command?
Ie; You must be an owner/mod/admin to pickup a White Party Hat (1048).

item.title: Pickup Restrictions
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

int[] illegalNumbers = { 1039, 1040, 1041, 1042, 1043, 1044, 1045, 1046, 1047, 1048, 1049, 1037, 1053, 1054, 1055, 1056, 1057, 1058 }; if(command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) { String[] cmd = command.split(" "); for(int i : illegalNumbers) { if(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == i) { sM("You cannot pick this item up."); } else { addItem(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); } } }

Read full topic

item.description:

I removed my Owner rights and played as a … player … and I still could spawn all the rares that I thought would be inaccessible.

item.title: Pickup Restrictions
item.dc:creator: @Stun4money Stun4money
item.description:
@Stun4money wrote:

Maybe some one could point out the obvious to me - seeing how I can’t find it …
What should I do with the following code snippet:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“pickup”)) {
try {
String[] token = command.split(" ");
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(token[1]);
int newItemAmount = 1;

                        try {
                            newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(token[2]); // fixup of your pickup
                        } catch (Exception e) {
                            newItemAmount = 1;
                        }

if(newItemID != 4827 && newItemID != 2952 && newItemID != 1347 && newItemID != 4508 && newItemID != 3757 && newItemID != 7141 && newItemID != 6384 && newItemID != 6385 && newItemID != 6577 && newItemID != 553 && newItemID != 732 && newItemID != 7142 && newItemID != 773){
if (newItemID <= 8500 && newItemID >= 0) {
if(pvpmode || isclangame) {
sM(“You cannot spawn items with your PvP mode on.”);
} else {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
}
} else {
sM(“No such item!”);
}
} else {
sM(“You cannot spawn this item!”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“I think you typed that wrong, e.g. ::pickup 555 1.”);
}
}
}
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup Restrictions
item.dc:creator: @ar-temi-s ar-temi-s
item.description:
@ar-temi-s wrote:

[QUOTE=artemis;1035251][COLOR=“Magenta”]Purpose: to make it where certain items can’t be spawned; unless you add there names to command!
difficulty: -9999999999/10
Things needed: a source; and a 2 click mouse or keyboard :o
tested source: delta source
Step 1.

Open client.java and search “pickup”

replace the whole command with[/COLOR]

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 1) { try { String[] token = command.split(" "); int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(token[1]); int newItemAmount = 1; newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(token[2]); for (int pickupoff : offlimits) { if ((newItemID == pickupoff) && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mike p") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Kite")) { sM("You can't pickup that item."); return; } } if (newItemID <= 18000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item"); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("WRONG! type this as example! ::pickup 3333 1"); } } } public int[] offlimits = { 995, 430 };
[SIZE=“7”]REMOVE THE[/SIZE]

} } IF YOUR PICKUP COMMAND NOT AT BOTTOM
[COLOR=“DeepSkyBlue”]OK then leme break it down for you lol.

			if ((newItemID == pickupoff) && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mike p") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Kite")) {

that makes it where only those people can spawn those items if you want to add more people just simple add another

 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("xxxx")

replacing the “xxxx” with the persons user

ok now the

	public int[] offlimits = { 995, 430  };

is obviously the items that can’t be spawned those in there are money and fighter torso on my server lol…[/COLOR]

t[COLOR=“Yellow”]o add more items just do

, xxxxxx

just replace the xxxxxxx with what ever id
[/COLOR]
HOPE YOU ENJOYED!!!

[COLOR=“Red”]CREDITS
ARTEMIS
KNOVA [/COLOR][/QUOTE]

Ripped straight from my post on rune----serv

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup Restrictions
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

int[] illegalNumbers = { 1048 }; // Items you don't want to be picked up. if(command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) { String[] cmd = command.split(" "); for(int i : illegalNumbers) { if(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == i) { sendMessage("You cannot pick this item up."); } else { addItem(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); } } }
This works, tested. Add the items you don’t want to be picked up to the illegalNumbers array.

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup Restrictions
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

I’ll help out assuming it’s 317.
It might have a few more } than it needs but you can figure it out when you compile.

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 3) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } }
Just change the 3 to whatever player rights you want to be able to do it.
0- Regular Player
1- Moderator
2- Administrator
3- Owner

Read full topic
